title: Bison Came Back
description: Have you ever seen a bison? Did you know these big, majestic animals were almost extinct? Bison Came Back provides students a comprehensive look at these amazing animals and how they managed to survive. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify cause- and-effect relationships and the proper use of commas in a series.
highFrequencyWords: bison, exist, extinct, hides, roam, shelter
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
